title: The Commander
description: Clare Blake is New Scotland Yard's highest-ranking woman officer. Icy-cool, ambitious but reckless, she lets her personal life bleed into her career, defying convention and risking her reputation. Amanda Burton stars as the female cop who crosses the line in four taut police dramas from Prime Suspect creator Lynda La Plante.
details: {"Content advisory": ["Nudity", "violence", "alcohol use"], "Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Tristram Powell"], "Producers": ["Christopher Hall", "Lynda La Plante"], "Starring": ["Amanda Burton", "Matthew Marsh", "Poppy Miller"]}
